youtube.title: How the Epiglottis Works: Why Food Doesn't Enter Your Lungs
youtube.description: Discover the incredible mechanism of the epiglottis! This 3D medical animation explains the swallowing process and how your body prevents choking by sealing the windpipe. Perfect for students and science lovers. #biology #humanbody #anatomy
